text: hussin liladhin jahaduu whdanyt allah alhyat aldunya wama fiha min alshahawat walmldhat, wahum yastahziuwn balmwmnyn. whwla' aladhin yakhshawn rabahum fawq jmye alkufaar yawm alqyamt; hayth ydkhlhm allah 'aelaa darajat aljnt, wayunazil alkafirin 'asfal drkat alnar. wallah yarzuq man yasha' min khalaqah bighayr hsab
